main_text:
Recent Work in Analytic Philosophical Theology
2. Recent Work in Analytic Philosophical Theology

Recent work in analytic philosophical theology has engaged with nearly
every major Christian doctrine. But work has focused on the most
central doctrines: Trinity, Incarnation and Christology, Salvation and
Atonement, and Sin and Original Sin. This section lays out the most
significant philosophical problems associated with each doctrine and
identifies some of the foundational philosophical responses from
contemporary thinkers.
section_title: 2. Recent Work in Analytic Philosophical Theology
